data.title: Convert Algerian Dinars (DZD) and Nigerian Nairas (NGN): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in Algerian Dinar (DZD) to and from Nigerian Naira (NGN) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This Algerian Dinar and Nigerian Naira convertor is up to date with exchange rates from August 17, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of Algerian Dinar. Use "Swap currencies" to make Nigerian Naira the default currency. Click on Nigerian Nairas or Algerian Dinars to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

The Algerian Dinar is the currency in Algeria (DZ, DZA). The Nigerian Naira is the currency in Nigeria (NG, NGA). The symbol for DZD can be written DA. The symbol for NGN can be written N. The Algerian Dinar is divided into 100 centimes. The Nigerian Naira is divided into 100 kobo. The exchange rate for the Algerian Dinar was last updated on August 15, 2024 from The International Monetary Fund. The exchange rate for the Nigerian Naira was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The DZD conversion factor has 6 significant digits. The NGN conversion factor has 4 significant digits.
